title: 6 Months In! These past two weeks have been feeling weird.
post:
I feel like my moods have been all over the place and I feel more anxious/paranoid. Super strange just feeling a bit out of my body? Not sure if this is a sign of maybe needing to increase dose or a sign that the Pristiq isn’t working any longer. 

Does anyone have similar experiences with Pristiq around 6 months?? Thank you!
disclosure: I feel like my moods have been all over the place and I feel more anxious/paranoid

title: 23f 25m Can a lonely ex get back if she had a good relationship but broke up because of one mistake?
post:
So I was in 3 years beautiful relationship with this girl there used to be fights happening but we were attached and there was love. 

This year’s since June I was trying to focus on career and she was feeling I was getting distant. Which was not the case I assured.

In July one day I was high and drunk and I texted another girl who was my friend long time back before my relationship and it was a nasty text. It wasn’t a conversation with her. Just a impulsive text that I regret till now because I accept it was my mistake.

She found out in September about the text she got mad and was hurt told me it’s over and all.
She kept me on hold for a month to reevaluate things and November she said it’s over I don’t want to discontinue.

In one month I really told her yes it was my mistake but I promise I won’t do such thing again and I did everything possible to get her back.

After breakup she used to call once a week telling me I miss you and all that. I kept no contact with her but she used to call me once a week and says I miss you and when I talk nicely with the love we had she says my decision is constant.

I asked her to meet and talk but she’s like I don’t have the courage.

It really suck she never forgave me idk if she was looking for a reason or idk can’t figure it out.

How can people just walk away after years together 

I know she’s hurt but so am I 

Just feels leaving is not the best option
label: Age_Gender

title: Induction Hob getting pan hot
post:
I’m looking to cook my next steak better than I have in the past, I’ve never experimented with reverse searing before and I only have an induction hob and either a frying pan or a griddle like pan with grooves. I’ve not cooked a steak with an induction hob before and I’m looking for advice on the best way to get a good sear. I’m also looking for advice on weather it’s worth reverse searing first.
The steaks are about an inch thick and Ribeye, I like my steak rare. I don’t have any kind of thermometer. Also I’m from the UK and using a fan oven so if possible please use celsius. 

Thank you for any advice.

Whether*

Also, from UK

Induction is the BEST cooker for getting pans hot, continuous power into the pan, light that thing up on the most powerful hob of the cooker, you can get them glowing...

If you like it rare, I'd say get the pan/griddle pan hot AF, then drop a VERY lightly oiled steak (salt&pepper before oiling) onto the pan, 90secs a side....

Close all the doors to the kitchen, and open the windows 🥳

Heat your plates in the microwave for 1:30-2mins

title: Medicated cycle success?
post: I’m getting super frustrated with the ttc process and need some encouraging stories. Have people had success with medicated cycles (letrozole)? We’re going to try letrozole, trigger, and TI this time and it will be our second medicated cycle. I’m already telling myself it probably won’t work but trying to stay positive :( how many cycles has it taken others? Any tips?
comment:
I was feeling the same way going into my second cycle. I was devastated after I wasn’t pregnant the first and couldn’t be anything but negative.

Second cycle was full of negativity for me and I stopped symptom spotting. My husband was tired of me being negative and said “take a test already!”

It immediately became positive and I sobbed like a baby couldn’t believe it!! That was cycle 2!! And I believe it worked out this way for a reason 

First cycle my follicle was 19mm,we had people visiting, and it was just difficult because everything felt rushed.

Second cycle we had relations couple nights before the shot and then as they instructed and the boom 12DPO I got my positive and follicle was 22mm 😃

Not sure if follicle size matters but it made me feel more positive 

Tips: have sex a couple days before. Sperm can live up to 5 days in the uterus so you want it there waiting when the egg comes down. I laid down for 15 minutes after each time, with my legs up for 2 instead of peeing right after. And when my husband was “finishing up” I did not let him move and held him in place lol. Some doctors say it doesn’t matter but may have helped 🤷🏻‍♀️

Good luck 💞
label: Husband_BF

title: M4F wanting to do fandom Roles
post:
-I’m 18+ and want a partner who is as well. 

-Be literate. No one liners. I’ll usually try to match my partners length but I prefer doing about a paragraph or so. I also prefer playing in first person but will play in third.

-I prefer playing OC. You can play canon or OC. Whichever you prefer is fine with me.

-I’m looking for someone creative so we can bounce ideas off of each other. I like playing with someone who is as invested as I am.

Fandoms and my preferred pairings (I’m open to suggestions)

Marvel: My OC x OC or Gwen Stacy

Dc: (Preferred) My OC x OC or Raven/Supergirl/Batgirl/Wonder Woman

Naruto: My OC x OC or Hinata/Ino

One Piece: My OC x OC or Nico Robin

My hero: My OC x OC or Momo/Miruko

Star Wars: My OC x your OC or Preferred cannon character

Avatar the last Airbender: My OC x your OC or Preferred cannon character

Overwatch: My OC x your OC or preferred OW Woman/women

(Non fandom Roles) 

Neighbors: I am a mysterious man who had just moved next door a few months ago. I am only seen occasionally since I’m constantly leaving early and arriving late. One day you, my next door neighbor, finally saw me in the backyard of my house relaxing. 

Mage: In this world everyone is born with a basic magic that you can train with. It could be something like simply making bubbles or gravity manipulation. You can go to a guild to test and try to become a mage (their version of a hero). At a guild you can go on adventures and take bounties. I’m born with a magic considered weak. Shadow magic, a magic thought to be able to expand and cloak yourself in shadows. 

Gods: gods are real. But gods can be “killed”. Instead of actually dying they get reincarnated into a host body. Some Gods work with the host, while some completely take over and suppress the hosts personality, others will allow the host to just use the power with some guidance. I am the reincarnation of Sun Wukong and you could be whoever you want. We travel fighting villains and demons for fun and getting into trouble as well.

title: Tall (women’s) riding pant recommendations
post:
I am 5’10” and 140lbs female with a slender build and 34” inseam seeking recommendations for protective moto pants. Earlier this year I nearly lost my leg in a motorcycle accident. My kevlar jeans saved my leg from complete laceration but my injury was still very severe. This time around, I’m more conscious of lower body protection but struggling to find a pair of everyday protective moto pants that fit (mainly length issues) and are somewhat flattering. If I’m spending $400+ on moto pants, I’d rather not look like a kid swimming in my dads baggy gear. Prior to breaking my leg, I wore armored Kevlar jeans with knee/hip pads and leggings/rain pants layered as needed. In this setup, my legs felt much more exposed than the rest of my body in full gear. Some points to consider for recommendations:

* I commute on my motorcycle daily, go on week-long moto camping tours, and ride in a lot of group events. I end up wearing my gear all day rather than stripping at every stop I make. Versatility and comfort are key.

* Climate where I ride ranges from 40*F-90*F with a mix of rain and sunshine. I’d prefer to buy 1 pair of all-weather overpants with removable insulation/rain liner.

* My everyday wardrobe is either skinny jeans or scrubs so mesh under-armor wouldn’t work for me. Hip and knee protection are a must. Shin protection would be nice but is not necessary. 

* Length is super important for me, as much female-oriented gear lands at mid-shin leaving the knee pads on my thighs. For whatever reason, moto gear manufacturers seem to think that adding 4” of fabric to the end of pants is sufficient without re-proportioning the garment (hint: it’s not). I’m open to men’s gear but again, it’d be nice to wear something flattering since I ride daily.

title: Tall (women’s) riding pant recommendations
post:
I am 5’10” and 140lbs female with a slender build and 34” inseam seeking recommendations for protective moto pants. Earlier this year I nearly lost my leg in a motorcycle accident. My kevlar jeans saved my leg from complete laceration but my injury was still very severe. This time around, I’m more conscious of lower body protection but struggling to find a pair of everyday protective moto pants that fit (mainly length issues) and are somewhat flattering. If I’m spending $400+ on moto pants, I’d rather not look like a kid swimming in my dads baggy gear. Prior to breaking my leg, I wore armored Kevlar jeans with knee/hip pads and leggings/rain pants layered as needed. In this setup, my legs felt much more exposed than the rest of my body in full gear. Some points to consider for recommendations:

* I commute on my motorcycle daily, go on week-long moto camping tours, and ride in a lot of group events. I end up wearing my gear all day rather than stripping at every stop I make. Versatility and comfort are key.

* Climate where I ride ranges from 40*F-90*F with a mix of rain and sunshine. I’d prefer to buy 1 pair of all-weather overpants with removable insulation/rain liner.

* My everyday wardrobe is either skinny jeans or scrubs so mesh under-armor wouldn’t work for me. Hip and knee protection are a must. Shin protection would be nice but is not necessary. 

* Length is super important for me, as much female-oriented gear lands at mid-shin leaving the knee pads on my thighs. For whatever reason, moto gear manufacturers seem to think that adding 4” of fabric to the end of pants is sufficient without re-proportioning the garment (hint: it’s not). I’m open to men’s gear but again, it’d be nice to wear something flattering since I ride daily.

* I wear [this](https://www.revzilla.com/motorcycle/spidi-4season-evo-h2out-womens-jacket?gclid=Cj0KCQiAtbqdBhDvARIsAGYnXBPWnwbRojt1lxtuhZv5I_QpfzAZMe7Vaknamh9SdY1wwRh32WPbux0aAn7qEALw_wcB) jacket in size medium so it’d be cool to find something somewhat matching but I’m not too attached to that idea.

parent_comment: I don't know that they fit the fashionable side at all, but aerostich will make any pants, jackets or suits to your custom measurements and they come with the armor and abrasion features you're listing. They do men's and women's versions so the cuts will at least fit, though they won't look like jeans per se.
comment:
Agreed. 

My Aerostitch AD-1pants have been comfortable in all weather conditions—wet, dry, sunny, windy, snowy, from 9°F to 123°F. I’ve even hiked in them on cold motorcycle trips. 

Full-length leg zippers mean they go on/off over your street clothes in seconds, and full armor gives excellent crash protection (yes, I’ve tested that as well). 

As mentioned, they’ll do custom sizes. And they’ll do repairs if needed, even on really old stuff. Though you won’t need repairs for anything other than a crash. 

They’re the only riding pants I’ve needed in 20 years.

comment: I have an idea. I did this with my parents when I was 13, and I will give you the same advice, just with some tweaks. My mom is amazing, but my dad can get hard on me, even threatening to hurt me, but that was not the worst part. The abuse was that he emotionally gaslit me into telling me that I was the one in the wrong, even if he purposely contradicted himself to make me lol bad and mess me up even more. The next part I want you to do. I decided to set my parents down for a family meeting, and called my dad a bitch and rushed at me. I slit my left wrist. I then told them that I was not bluffing and that I would end my life if they did not sit and listen to me. However, for you, I would instead place a Camera at the edge of the table, or somewhere where you can record what goes on and then when/if your parents try to hit you when you start talking to them about what’s going on, just beg them to stop at then Take the recording and give it to the police
disclosure: my dad can get hard on me, even threatening to hurt me,

title: Debating on a JP-5
post: I'm looking for a top of the line pcc that will be a ton of fun at the range and great for home defense and a good host for a suppressor. I know the JP-5 is overkill but I don't know about anything else really that's as good to shoot and as reliable and high quality. I'm also debating on which length to get between the 8.5", 10.5" or 14.5". I would love to get my hands on one but I don't believe there are any dealers in Southeast MI. If anyone has feedback or what their thought process was please let me know
comment:
I love my JP5 its been absolutely realiable and its my favorite gun to shoot. The locking pieces are kind of expensive at 100 a piece but having the ability to change them for factory ammo is awesome. Im sure it will be a great suppressor host. 

My wife refuses to shoot a regular Ar15 but she shot the JP5 and after [running the plate rack](https://imgur.com/a/68TmTk6) the first time she was hooked. 

If its going to be a suppressor host I would go for the 8.5 myself.
label: Possession

title: my friends aren’t talking to me :(
post:
a while ago i had a situation happen that resulted in me losing a lot of friends.  it wasn’t my fault or theirs.  i try to stay connected with a couple of them who i thought i was really close with.  and they said they wanted to be friends too.  

we were supposed to hang out this week, and they said they would let me know more about their availability.  well they haven’t.  i don’t want to reach out again because i don’t like to be the only person who reaches out.. i don’t consider that a real friendship.  

lately i’m feeling like i really don’t have friends.  i used to have a social life, now i’m alone.  it just sucks.  it really sucks
disclosure: i used to have a social life, now i’m alone
label: Mental_Health

title: is there anyone here for whom 4-ho-met just doesnt work?
post:
So i dosed exactly 25mg at the start and found it to be pretty underwealming so i redosed 10mg after 1,5h (both orally). The most effects i got from it was merging of the environment, but not in a cool way it looked like everything i see just losed details and was pretty blank. Not even mid visuals so im really suprised what people talk about these substance.
This has to be the worst substance i  have ever taken to be honest, absolutely nothing entertaining about it. 
Oh and i absolutely hated that everything on this substance seemd speed up. It was really hard to enjoy music on this because i thought my yt was set up to 1,25x speed lol.
Is there anyone with similiar experience?
parent_comment: Yup the headspace on homet (at least for me) is nonexistent, like for real nothing...
comment:
Oh i definitely get a headspace from high enough doses of ho met but it's just hilarious confusion and hasn't brought any real insight unlike shrooms.

It feels like my adhd is amplified x100 and my thought just are happening very fast and overlapping, making the whole thing chaotic and hard to make sense of.

Had to go to the shop because i realized I had no more food and spent 30 minutes looking for something then forgetting what i was looking for then just walking aimlessly until i realized it and started looking for something else hahahaha
label: Health

We know boys notice curves/tits etcetera but what do girls notice? Also don't say smth like abs bcs you can't normally see them unless the guy is intimate/close to you.

comment:
Knowing girls around me and what they like, they notice: hair, tallness, some say arms (with veins&stuff), some say hands (yes, like well groomed hands), probably smell

I am also a girl but none of the things above turn me on really. What I notice though: 

ass. Sometimes a good pair of jeans really makes a man's ass look good. 

Style: style can make someone very attractive. Good well chosen clothing. Color scheme. Balance. Etc.

Eyelashes. They're not a turn on, but when they're thick, it catches the eye.

pretty face. eyes. Stuff like that, the usual, you probably understand.

title: Brand new!! To diagnosis and meds
post:
Thank you so much for creating this group. I am so in over my head.  

Last month I was diagnosed with t2d. I am in my early 30s and am 5’5” at 150lbs. My glucose was 446 and my A1c was 13.8%. I didn’t feel sick or anything - felt totally normal. The reason I went to the doctor - the dermatologist actually! - was for insane hair loss. 

My brand new endocrinologist put me on 2000mg of Metformin a day. My glucose is still averaging around 260 a couple weeks later. So she JUST prescribed me mounjaro at 2.5 for one month, to go up to 5 after that. 

I am so new to diabetes and so new to medications. Any helpful tips or advice is so welcome here. About diet, meds, monitoring.. anything! I am swimming in information 🥵

THANK YOU!!
label: Health

Last month I was diagnosed with t2d. I am in my early 30s and am 5’5” at 150lbs. My glucose was 446 and my A1c was 13.8%. I didn’t feel sick or anything - felt totally normal. The reason I went to the doctor - the dermatologist actually! - was for insane hair loss. 

My brand new endocrinologist put me on 2000mg of Metformin a day. My glucose is still averaging around 260 a couple weeks later. So she JUST prescribed me mounjaro at 2.5 for one month, to go up to 5 after that. 

I am so new to diabetes and so new to medications. Any helpful tips or advice is so welcome here. About diet, meds, monitoring.. anything! I am swimming in information 🥵

THANK YOU!!
label: Health

title: GPU is to darn loud!!
post: Every time I play a game such as Fortnite or red dead my Nvidia GeForce RTX 3080 will have the fan speeds up to max RPM I have tried countless times to fix this whether this be deleting drivers or reducing fan speed/power with ALT + Z the GPU will still be so loud and go up to 100% through textures and everything will look great the sound of the graphics card fans maxing out is very alarming and makes me very worry some.
disclosure: I play a game such as Fortnite or red dead

title: Any fourth years stressed out on job hunting?
post:
After around 100 applications, I only have one single job offer. It's not my favorite company to work for but at least it's something. Not gonna lie, also very worried about my offer being rescinded or pushed back...

My goal is to reach around 1,000 application before my graduation date. It's a number game after all right? But it's so mentally draining and exhausting when companies give you the BS treatment (e.g., personality assessment, online quiz, assignment, Squid Game style multi round interviews)

With lots of companies beginning to freeze hiring and laying off workers in the current economy, it's giving me 2008 vibes.
disclosure: it's so mentally draining and exhausting
label: Mental_Health

title: Homeless vet needs back surgery
post:
My father is a veteran and is homeless (technically he lives in a trailer without electricity on an illegal cannabis farm). He has severe back issues and is scheduled to get back surgery at the VA but doesn't have a place to recover or any support. I'm assuming the VA deals with this stuff all the time. Does anybody have experience with this type of situation? Can they keep him until he is fully recovered?

He's kind of the traditional Vietnam PTSD veteran who wasn't able to integrate back into society. Unfortunately family support is not an option for a plethora of reasons.

Edit: I'm on hold with the homeless veterans program. I would still appreciate any information about options available.
disclosure: My father is a veteran and is homeless (technically he lives in a trailer without electricity on an illegal cannabis farm)
label: Family

title: What’s the one thing “your friend” got away with that nobody knows about?
comment:
Back in December 1981 my friend, who grew up in The Bronx, and I took a commuter bus from NJ into NYC to but theater tickets. We went out the Ninth Avenue exit of the Port Authority Building and walked to 42nd Street. A M42 MTA bus stopped at the corner to let passengers off and on and was rear ended by a box truck. Passengers in the bus were thrown all over. 

My friend immediately got into the open exit door of the bus, waved for me to join him, and then he dropped to the floor. I didn’t join him on the bus, but watched as police, fire and ambulances arrived. He and a half dozen other people were transported to St. Vincent’s Hospital. About a year later he, after attorney fees collected $60+ thousand dollars for his ‘injuries.’
disclosure: I took a commuter bus from NJ into NYC
label: Location

title: Mri being called back
post: Hi everyone , won't make this extremely long but those that's been following me , psoriasis since childhood , curve in since correct with non surgery , backpack in teens and adulthood,  and si pain , in 30s developed joint pains in knee wrist fingers toes , pain in hips , pain in one foot at side and arch part , pain servere on resting and lying down , restless at night as pain in bad , loss of natural lumbar lordosis, nasids gave me stomach issues , now aged 38 was sent to rheumatologist I'm female uk he wanted to built a better picture before giving me a diagnosis,  so sent me for xrays of hip and Lower back and did hla b27 and crp , mri of spinal, now xrays and blood tests I had in July 2022 heard nothing back , mri I had to wait for till Nov 2022 , appointment booked for follow up 5th Jan 2023 as he said report will take a few weeks from mri, however letter landed on my doormat from hospital saying the consultant radiologist doing the report wants me back for a mri with more views of the spine before he completes the report , so now I'm wondering why I'm being called back for more views , what more can be seen on a spinal ? Maybe not clear enough I'm not sure , letter just says he wants more views,  guess I'm wondering if anyone else has had the same , my appointment with rheumatology is still going ahead before the mri scan so I guess he can maybe fill me in , but at this point I'm going to assume either pictures not good enough or something showed up and they need a better angle maybe , so frustrating,  thanks for reading
label: Health
